root.name: Last Rites
root.description: You take control of a commander of Special Forces who is given a mission to rescue humanity from the zombies that have taken over the world. Last Rites is a mission-based Doom clone and is set in the future which provides you with an arsenal of hi-tech weapons. In about half of the games missions you have a team of four other commandos with you, who give you covering fire and help you fight hte zombies. This game was only released in Europe.
